FuncDef: This command configures the minimum number of free addresses.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the desired minimum number of free addresses in this pool. If the actual number of free addresses in this pool falls below this configured minimum, a notification is generated. Values-0 to 255.
indicates the value indicates a percentage.
Enables a system-generate event when all available addresses in the pool/subnet of local DHCP server are depleted.
